abilities.name: Tactical Genius
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when a friendly **REGIMENT** unit within 12" of that model is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Lord Castellan
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, that unit can be affected by up to two different Orders at the same time.
